1. Take Profit/Stop Loss 2.0 Is Now Live
2. "Trading Preferences" has been added to allow users to switch between TP/SL on entire position and selected positions (USDT Perpetual)
3. TP/SL has been enabled for conditional order (USDT Perpetual)

3. TP/SL has been enabled for conditional order (USDT Perpetual)

1. Take Profit/Stop Loss 2.0 Is Now Live
2. "Trading Preferences" has been added to allow users to switch between TP/SL on entire position and selected positions (USDT Perpetual)
3. TP/SL has been enabled for conditional order (USDT Perpetual)

1. USDT Perpetual now supports new ETH, LINK, LTC and XTZ trading pairs.
2. The drawing tool has been optimized. Users can now draw on the panels of selected indicators.

1. Inverse Futures now supported
2. Revamped UI for better trading experience
3. “Show All Pairs” feature now available
4. Manually-adjusted risk limit system for USDT Perpetual Contracts
5. Alert sound added for order execution
6. Calculator added for USDT Perpetual Contracts
7. ADA/USDT, DOT/USDT and UNI/USDT now available
